评论详情: They looked faded but worked for my kids costume.
Our family just started going to RenFaire's. Figuring out what to wear has been tricky, but these are great solutions. Comfy fit, lightweight, waist cinches. No belt loops.

Needed something for my visit to the Ren Fair and this worked out. Was very comfortable and has a drawstring to tighten. No belt loops. I think I bought a 2xl and it fit perfect, I'm a 38-40 inch waist and 6'2 and the length was just right.

These reniessance shorts are a fantastic price e. The material is a bit on the thin side but nice and breathable during hot seasons. Perfect for layering. Great way to add to beginning garb at a good price. Won't last you years of heavy use but will definitely last a few seasons with gentle use. True to size.
Buttons came off on first wearing

These pants have become my go-to for summer Renfairs and are a favorite for lounging around the house!  I love the fact the legs don't have elastic!  The simple band of fabric feels much better than the crinkled gathered mess many other styles offer.  The buttons are plain, which works well for a "historic" style.  The seams are well done - no missed fabric or loose threads - and the elastic waist band is comfortable - especially after a good meal 😅.  The style pairs well with different time periods - from viking to renaissance, though they may be a bit too baggy for colonial.  Time jump forward a bit and they're perfect for my frumpy older persona.Definitely pick up a pair.I wasn't sure what to expect when purchasing these, since the sizing chart provided was confusing.  My true waist size is about 44" so I purchased a 3XL.  I could totally have fit in just a regular XL.  No big deal, I simply hemmed the sides at the pocket seams and now have a perfectly comfortable pair of pants.  I'll order XL next time - just have to decide which color.

评论概述: My Husband Loves These Every Day Wear
评论详情: My husband likes to wear unique clothing, but it has to be easy to move in, live in, not be synthetic, and comfortable. If not, he won't wear them.  FABRIC These are natural fabric and comfortable to wear. They are thin enough to be great in summer when he is not in the mood to wear shorts  FIT He wears size 34 pants and these in XL fit him well. We got the XL in case of shrinkage and glad we did. If they shrink at all, he will still be able to wear them.  COMFORT He really likes these pants to wear after work when grilling in the yard, or lounging around. I am not sure if he will wear them in public or not.  THE BOTTOM LINE These run a little smaller, but will shrink if you accidentaly put in the dryer, so best to size up a bit.  MY RATING FIVE STARS. These are great- so glad they are cotton. My husband really likes them.
Works well for pirate costume could be used for other things. Quality is about on par with the price.

This review is for the Runcati Mens Renaissance Colonial Shorts Pirate Medieval Viking Navigator Costume Halloween Gothic Cosplay Pants.  I love this brand. I'm a short handicapped female, comfort is a must for my clothes! I get amny things for renfaire/cosplay but I'll also wear them for everyday. I have fun doing my own style. These are great material, soft/loose & comfortable, easy to wear, cool/breathable.... I got this pair in black. Only thing I wish they would do the larger open top patch pockets in more of their pants. I prefer than over the slash pockets.  Have fun with this brands pieces, make it your own style. Take the fam to a renfaire for some wholesome family fun! And don't sweat the details! LOL!  The regular price $24.99 per the listing is ok. You can get many of their nicely made pieces in the $20 - $25.00 price range.  As always I only do honest reviews and update if needed. I hope this helps you make the best choices how to spend your $.

These shorts are thin and comfortable, perfect for hot summer days at the Ren Faire. While it's not historically accurate, it fits within the general category. Great alternative to pants, and does a great job at keeping you cool. Not see-through either. Good fit, true to size.
They fit him well, are well made and comfortable to wear. They look like they fit the time period well and go with a lot of different Ren wear to create different styles of outfit.
looks as expected and fits well! they will be good for my costume. My only nitpick is that the fabric is on the see through side as some light colored fabric is, so be aware of that!

评论概述: Ok but not the most authentic in design
评论详情: I suppose it's my fault for not carefully examining the photos before ordering. The waist band and the leg bands are not authentic. They did not have elastic waist and leg bands in the Renaissance or Colonial periods. The waist would have either had ties to tie it closed or it would have just been loose and requiring a belt. The leg bands would have had a button or garter to close them.  If you don't care about authenticity then these things won't matter to you. As for me, I will need to deconstruct the waist and leg bands and take out the elastics and for pirate leggings I will add a button at the bottom and at the waist. I will also be replacing the buttons with wood buttons which would have been more authentic as well but already knew I was replacing the buttons when I ordered this.  I am only taking off one star for the above faults due to the low price.  I can only marginally recommend this with the above caveats.

评论概述: Forget cosplay---I wear these around all day out like capris
评论详情: They are comfy and well-made. they wash pretty well and go with just about anything. ill wear these with a black tank top and enjoy the Florida sunshine. ARGH MATEY!

Disclaimer : I'm an old guy that probably has no business wearing these pirate pants, but at my age I really don't care. I'm into comfort, function, and interesting. Well, these Pirate Pants are interesting. The material is thin, which is a must-have for living in old-person's Florida. Check. Just to be on the safe side I ordered XL size, glad I did. The fit is comfortable and a little baggy. Check. The material is 100% cotton, which is easy to maintain and soft to the skin. Check. The overall look of these short pants is "out there" for a pair of long shorts. Check. I'm now the 'cool kid' on my block. Check.

Even on long legs end up just below the knees.  Light breathable material, looks matt and airy. Feels like a cotton-linen mix.  All-button design. Legs openings are a bit narrowed. Sits well.  There is a rubber on the rear side of the waist to make it stretchy to fit a range of sizes. The extra stretch is about 5 inches.

I've got several pairs of pants for Ren Faires and such, and these are a fantastic addition to ye ol' wardrobe. They fit exactly as expected, and are very comfortable. The material is soft and flexible, and not at all itchy. I think I could easily and comfortably wear these all day.
Nice fabric.  Great for ren faire or SCA.

评论概述: Pretty comfortable, nice looking, decent quality
评论详情: For the price, they're comfortable and seem decent as far as quality goes. They do run slightly large, even with the elastic waistband. I do like that it has a stretchy waist, though. Definitely helps with the comfort on hot days working Renaissance fests or stuffy cons with less than adequate air exchange.

These shorts are pretty comfortable. I wasn't sure about the material but it got a little better after a wash. The pants go down a bit past my knees which is nice. It is a 3-button short and they stay secure around my waist. Furthermore, it does have pockets so it can hold my wallet and phone without falling too. These are great for just laying around the house or on the warmer renaissance days!

These are really nice cotton breeches (or capris if you don't feel fancy) and they are perfect for summer lounging or as a costume piece, they are nice and soft good quality cotton, they are breathable, but not so thin that you will see anything if you are standing backlit. They have nice deep pockets which is awesome, too many pants in this style don't bother with pockets and I have stuff I need to carry!  They fit perfectly, the elastic isn't too tight and the fabric doesn't feel too bunched up at the elastic so it is nothing but comfort. I am tempted to get a second pair in beige so I can dye them (cotton is a dream to dye) purple.

For the money these are awesome. They'd be perfect for all manner of cosplay scenarios, but honestly, they're pretty amazing to just lounge around in. Love the feel of the natural cotton. Super comfortable fit with the elastic waistband. Whether you're a pirate, ben franklin, aladdin, christopher colombus, or a hippy chillin on the couch, you oughtta be pleased with these.
Fit great, washes up nicely, very comfortable to wear, made well, look great on

These blue shorts are very comfortable and look great. I love that they had pockets to hold my phone and keys. Great option for someone who likes to cosplay, attend ren faires, or just likes to have a different fashion style.

Really love the price, nice cotton & the comfy fit of these for the Renaissance festival/ reenactment OR daily wear BUT they ripped when bending over first wear! :( They werent too tight either the material wasjust too thin.
I got these pants for my son and he loves them! They're really comfy and seem to fit true to size, if maybe slightly loose. They're well made and look really cool, as well.

Ok... These are definitely cosplay in style but I gotta say they are actually insanely comfy to just wear. As such, I do wear them occasionally just to go out and do things. Drives my wife crazy but hey it feels right. I am 6'4, 225lbs and a 34/35 waist and size large fits great.

评论概述: Quality is good, runs large so buy a smaller size than you otherwise would
评论详情: The quality was decent, however they were very large. I normally wear a size large but these were too wide on me, and since there's no belt loops or draw string, it's problematic.  You're going to want to go down a size.  Other than that, the color is nice, the quality is good, they're sewn well and would make a good Renn Faire costume.

评论概述: Elastic at the waist, fits like a dream
评论详情: Breathable, comfy, soft and so kind, Skin-friendly fabric, gonna blow your mind.  Rock 'em at a fest or a special stage show, Medieval vibes, let your style flow. Elastic at the waist, fits like a dream, Four button closure, making you the theme.  Got two side pockets, keep your swag intact, Loose fit style, that's a pirate pact. Calf length fresh, in that retro scene, Viking vibes clean, looking like a king and queen.  Comfort to the max, while you sail that ship, These pants got the drip, you're fully equipped.

As a Ren Fair nerd, I have ordered several potential garb pieces online over the years. Some of them are surprisingly disappointing. These were the opposite. I wasn’t expecting much due to those past disappointments, but figured I’d give these a try anyway. I’m SO glad I did! The material is not cheap polyester junk. It’s legit cotton and it’s a good weight. Not see-through thin, and not sweaty behind thick. They’re well sewn. The pockets are deep enough to fit my phone. Can’t wait for the upcoming season!

评论概述: Great Look for a Modern Pirate
评论详情: I got these to go with a Sailor/Viking costume that I am slowly assembling. I like the button-up linen look, so I ordered these. They look great, and I love the elastic in the back as it allows for more comfort and better sizing. The linen gives it a more rustic look, and it definitely goes with some of my other linen apparel for the costume. It's a fantastic option for a convention or renaissance faire!

评论概述: True to size, nice quality, stretch waist
评论详情: Perfect costume pants for my upcoming event! I did a quick try-on to start getting my costume ready, and love these. They fit well. I picked up a size Large, and am 5'8" 160lbs and usually wear about a 33" waist, and these were great. The elastic waist gives them some room. Very happy with these, and they pair well with the Runcati shirt I have on in the second picture. Great long costume shorts!
